name: Pummeling Bully
text: Your combo has the chance to trip or move your target.
prerequisites: Improved Reposition, Improved Trip, Improved Unarmed Strike, Pummeling Style; base attack bonus +9, brawler level 5th, or monk level 5th.
benefit: When you use Pummeling Style to make an entire full attack or flurry of blows against a single target, if you hit with any of your attacks, you can attempt a reposition or trip combat maneuver check as a free action.
staminaText: When you hit with a Pummeling Style attack, you can spend 2 stamina points to make a bull rush attempt as a free action instead of a reposition attempt.
text_zh: 你的力道刚猛无比，足以将弱者吹走或掀翻。
prerequisites_zh: 精通复位（Improved Reposition）APG，精通摔绊，精通徒手击打，刚烈掌，BAB+9或拳师等级5或武僧等级5。
benefit_zh: 在使用刚烈掌流派时，若全回合疾风连击只针对单个目标，则你伴随攻击可以发动一次复位或摔绊战技攻击尝试。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用刚烈掌进行攻击时，你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个自由动作做出一次冲撞而不是移位尝试。
